 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָעַךְ‎</span>] **verb** ==press, squeeze== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעַךְ‎</span>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***rub***); — 

**Qal** ***Passive participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּמָעוּךְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְכָתוּת וְנָתוּק וְכָרוּת‎</span> [[Lev.22.24|Lev 22:24]] ([[BDB#H|H]]), not to be offered to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, reference to emasculation (compare [[BDB#Di|Di]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַחֲנִיתוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעוּכָהבָֿאָרֶץ‎</span> [[1Sam.26.7|1Sam 26:7]] ***and his spear pressed*** (thrust) ***into the ground.*** **Pu\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמָּה מֹעֲכוּ שְׁדֵיהֶן‎</span> [[Ezek.23.3|Ezek 23:3]] ***there were their breasts squeezed*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִשּׂוּ‎</span>; unchastely; figurative of intercourse of Samaria and Jerusalem with Egypt, involving idolatry).
